attributes.action: abolish the opt out of the European Working Time Directive.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people are working more than 48 hours per week at the same time as unemployment being unacceptably high.  Employment should be more evenly distributed across the population.  The working time directive will give unemployed people more opportunities to earn a living while preventing employed people from having unfair excessive opportunities.

Opportunity to work at all is more important than opportinuty to work overtime.
